Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy

question.title: What are the main long-term consequences of pelvic inflammatory disease (PID) in women?

option_a.title: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy
option_a.description: The main long-term consequences of PID in women

option_b.title: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal ligation and ectopic pregnancy
option_b.description: A possible consequence of PID, but not the main one

option_c.title: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal ligation and pelvic pain
option_c.description: A possible symptom of PID, but not a long-term consequence

option_d.title: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal ligation and human papillomavirus (HPV)
option_d.description: A possible risk factor for PID, but not a direct consequence
